attributes.action: Let all Governments work on grants from their national banks and not have to tax
attributes.background: Let’s make all governments stand on their own two feet and not be dependent on us and business for its money. Work on grants from their national bank and not have to pay it back as long as it’s used for good causes like public services. The national banks doesn’t need to relie on it’s reserves.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
